net.ffxml.swtforms.util
Class AbstractUnitConverter

java.lang.Object
  net.ffxml.swtforms.util.AbstractUnitConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
UnitConverter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultUnitConverter
public abstract class AbstractUnitConverter
extends Object
implements UnitConverter

An abstract implementation of the UnitConverter that minimizes the effort required to convert font-dependent sizes to pixels.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
See Also:
DefaultUnitConverter, com.jgoodies.forms.layout.Size, com.jgoodies.forms.layout.Sizes

getDialogBaseUnitsX

protected abstract double getDialogBaseUnitsX(Control control)
Gets and returns the horizontal dialog base units. Implementations are encouraged to cache previously computed dialog base units.

Parameters:
control - a control that provides the fontmetrics
Returns:
the horizontal dialog base units
